name: Monastic Legacy

sections.text: Add half the levels you have in classes other than monk to your monk level to determine your effective monk level for your AC bonus. As a free action, you can expend one use of mythic power to add half your tier to your effective monk level to determine your base unarmed strike damage and AC bonus until the start of your next turn.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Every new experience carries you another step further along your path to enlightenment.
